Nighlight:

Nighlight moved her head in a negative way while a tear fell 
down"It's the only way... the only way"said in way that she showed 
her concern and pain "Unicron hasn't arrived yet... the weapon can 
be finished if we sent troops to help Triped and Predacons... it 
could be done before... before... "

Her pain didn't let ther finished
